txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Leathery fur from beasts surrounding Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'Oh I am certain that we will find a use for these. Thank you.'
'We can always find a use for the fur from the wolves and the like near our town.'
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of leathery fur to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the leathery fur to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering leathery fur from beasts surrounding Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Leathery fur from beasts surrounding Oatbarton.
